paragraphs: Investigation of insurance claims of all types — property, life, health, auto and professional liability. Verification of event circumstances, data examination and evidence collection for claim assessment.
Ongoing work with leading insurance companies in Israel while meeting binding timelines.
Professional surveillance operations including visual documentation, detailed reporting and findings analysis. Completely discreet execution using advanced technologies.
Regular and occasional surveillance as required by the case.

Comprehensive background checks including employment history, financial status, criminal background and credibility verification. Suitable for employee recruitment, business partnerships and transactions.
Detailed and accurate reports with verified information.
Tracing of assets, accounts, addresses and business information. Using licensed databases and professional investigation methods to obtain a complete picture.
Fast and accurate service for legal, financial and business needs.
Internal investigations, fraud detection, Due Diligence and disciplinary investigations. Service tailored to businesses and public organizations.
Professional and discreet work that protects organizational interests.
Dedicated investigation services for municipalities — eligibility checks, enforcement, property tax investigations and various inquiries requiring professional fieldwork.
Extensive experience working with authorities and public bodies.

about.opening: Licensed private investigator with over **15 years** of experience. A reputation for professionalism, reliability and **uncompromising** discretion.
about.narrative1: The firm specializes in investigations for leading insurance companies, municipalities, law firms and businesses. Every case receives personal attention and is handled with a professional approach that combines extensive field experience with advanced tools and technologies.
about.narrative2: Our approach is simple: achieve accurate results, with maximum speed, while maintaining absolute discretion. We believe every client deserves the highest level of service — with no shortcuts.
